text: Allow the blogs to be on more than one url. For example, some may have `<http://blog.domain.com|blog.domain.com>` and that same company may choose to repurpose the blog template for other things like Resources or Case Studies so it would be `<http://domain.com/resources|domain.com/resources>` or `<http://domain.com/case-studies|domain.com/case-studies>` with the current way, they would be forced to have it as `<http://blog.domain.com/resources(case-studies)|blog.domain.com/resources(case-studies)>`
Would love to see this as well, especially for clients with the smaller website package, but I'm guessing the whole blog repurposing thing will be phased out with a larger focus on HubDB
Most likely, I'd like to see a better linking of the HubDB tables like with SQL. Just joining a two tables on a similar key.
